mapper.select: select * from ( select a.csnum, a.ctype, a.cusid, a.csbjt, a.ccont, a.crdcn, DATE_FORMAT(a.cdate , '%Y-%m-%d') as cdate, a.ctmid, a.crerf, a.crelv, a.cresq, IFNULL(b.recom,0) as recom, case when c.uuid is null then substring(left(substring_index(substring_index(ccont, 'src="', -1),'<', 1), 4), 2) else c.uuid end as uuid, c.uploadpath, case when c.filename is null then concat('') else c.filename end as filename, case when c.filetype is null then substring(substring_index(substring_index(ccont, 'img' , -1),'"', 1), 2) else c.filetype end as filetype, d.cname from cusbod a left outer join ( select csnum, sum(recom) as recom from crecom group by csnum ) b on (a.csnum = b.csnum) left outer join attach c on (a.csnum = c.bno and a.cusid = c.cusid and a.ctype = c.ctype) left outer join cususr d on (a.cusid = d.cusid) order by a.cdate desc, a.crerf desc, a.cresq asc ) x x.cname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') x.csbjt LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') x.ccont LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by x.crerf desc, x.cresq asc LIMIT #{startRow}, #{amount}
